thread.title: Halt on Trump travel ban extended indefinitely by Hawaii judge
thread.title_full: Halt on Trump travel ban extended indefinitely by Hawaii judge

author: RT
title: Halt on Trump travel ban extended indefinitely by Hawaii judge
text: Halt on Trump travel ban extended indefinitely by Hawaii judge Published time: 30 Mar, 2017 03:08 Edited time: 30 Mar, 2017 03:09 Get short URL US District Court Judge Derrick Watson has extended his halt on enforcement of President Donald Trump's executive order travel ban, from a temporary order to an indefinite one in a new preliminary injunction. Here is the FULL TEXT of the Preliminary Injunction issued by Judge Watson in #Hawaii v. Trump. #NoBanNoWall https://t.co/FIfrY0TLcN pic.twitter.com/qziTX7Rz0K
